explanation:
code_hardening: Implemented lazy initialization with a null check for the cached panel, used final local constants for preferred dimensions, ensured scrollbar focusability is set only once, and guarded against a null scrollbar.
resolve_compilation_errors: Introduced use of the existing cached field fontNamePanel, referenced the existing TOP_PANE_PREFERRED_HEIGHT constant, and used fully qualified class names where imports are not shown.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Replaced constructor-time placeholder behavior with lazy initialization, switched to a BorderLayout-based panel, added an accessible "Font Name" label with mnemonic 'F' associated to the font-family text field, composed a center subpanel with the text field above a scrollable font list, and configured the scroll pane to always show the vertical scrollbar and disable its focus.
refactoring: Extracted magic numbers into named local constants, renamed locals for clarity (label, centerPanel, scrollPane), and structured the panel-building code for readability within the single function.
misc: Added brief inline comments describing lazy initialization and accessibility intent; no new custom API calls beyond standard Swing components were introduced.
